name: YouTube - Better Full Dark Theme 2019 (ARC)
description: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ★Installation guide *CLICK* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ★Problem fix guide *CLICK* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ★Restore old layout guide *CLICK* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ►Please use "Customize Settings" to select layout. Options with "⚠" are important to install theme properly. ►For new layout please enable dark theme in YT settings first, and select option ⚠2 to "ON". To have dark theme permanently even after clearing cookies, select ⚠2 to "OFF", but it may be bugged/glitchy for some browsers. Think about it! And don't blame. ►If you have any problem there guides above! ►Report bugs with screenshot and without rating please..
